hadiths.text: Abu Humaid As-Sa'idi narrated:"When the Prophet would prostrate, he placed his nose and his forehead on the ground, and he held his forearms away from his sides, and he placed his hands parallel to his shoulders

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السُّجُودِ عَلَى الْجَبْهَةِ وَالأَنْفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Prostrating One the Forehead And The Nose
